entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.6.1
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Adds a toggle for all levels  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3321 (5e330)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes empty blank links to not show up as json  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3324 (2c2e3)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3318 (6722a)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3322 (853a5)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3327 (dc9f4)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.6.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Removes rounded corners in compact mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3332 (8b1ad)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes an edge case where a container might get stuck in created state  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3338 (f3ab5)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3330 (ce096)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3336 (4026e)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.7.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Updates logo  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3340 (96fbe)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes timeout flag  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3345 (36a5d)
  • Limit default SQL log entries to 100  -  by @yubiuser in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3346 (cd63b)
  • Unfound fields are shown by default instead of hidden  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3342 (c1d31)
  • Fixes toggle all when fields have not been set for JSON  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3349 (cce2e)
  • deps: Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3348 (00da1)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.7.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Skips healthcheck for agents  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3366 (cc77c)
  • Checks level with equal sign  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3368 (d529e)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fix link color when using colorized logs  -  by @Jeto143 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3357 (40935)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3363 (63be3)
